item.description:
Good morning Somerville Snowboarders!
[PSA] If you haven't been monitoring the message board, you've missed out on a few trips already. Update your meetup preferences to accept emailings from the message group + announcements/events and keep informed. [/PSA]

Wanted to get the word out on a trip leaving in an hour out of Nashua, NH. I have the details in the message board already, but we'll clear the squawk pipe and sent them again via this route:

Organizer - Bill James
Cell Phone - 603.557.6055
email - bill@imaginetworks.com

Hi all - short notice, but there has *got* to be some people in this group who are still alive out there somewhere, so I wanted to make the offer.

Snowboarding at Loon on Sunday, 1 Feb.

I am leaving out of Nashua, NH at approx 6am and I will have room for one or two people. Expected return to Nashua 6pm +-

I will be picking up two snowboarders up around exit 20 off of I93, so best way to get in on this trip is to meet me before I hit the highway, or get picked up along I93 as well. Have a Durango with a roof rack, so gear will be the only space issue inside.
Planning on being back in Nashua while whatever football game is on is still in progress since the superbowl isn't really until next year as far as I am concerned.

If interested, please get in touch ASAP!
item.name: Sunday at Loon Mountain
